resources.string:
Winter/Spring Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Winter Solstice and Spring Equinox; February [northern hemisphere], or August [southern hemisphere].

Spring/Summer Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Spring Equinox and Summer Solstice; May [northern hemisphere], or November [southern hemisphere].

Summer/Fall Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Summer Solstice and Fall Equinox; August [northern hemisphere], or February [southern hemisphere].

Fall/Winter Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Fall Equinox and Winter Solstice; November [northern hemisphere], or May [southern hemisphere].
